question_text: Assertion (A): The process of evaporation causes cooling. Reason (R): The particles of liquid absorb energy from the surroundings to regain the energy lost during evaporation. (A) Both A and R are true and R is the correct explanation of A. (B) Both A and R are true but R is not the correct explanation of A. (C) A is true but R is false. (D) A is false but R is true.
subject: Science

question_text: Assertion (A): Lysosomes are known as the suicide bags of the cell. Reason (R): If the cell gets damaged, lysosomes may burst and the enzymes digest their own cell. (A) Both A and R are true and R is the correct explanation of A. (B) Both A and R are true but R is not the correct explanation of A. (C) A is true but R is false. (D) A is false but R is true.
subject: Science

question_text: Assertion (A): Mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell. Reason (R): Energy required for various chemical activities is released by mitochondria in the form of ATP. (A) Both A and R are true and R is the correct explanation of A. (B) Both A and R are true but R is not the correct explanation of A. (C) A is true but R is false. (D) A is false but R is true.
subject: Science

question_text: Assertion (A): When a car takes a sharp turn at high speed, the passengers tend to get thrown to one side. Reason (R): It is due to the property of inertia of direction. (A) Both A and R are true and R is the correct explanation of A. (B) Both A and R are true but R is not the correct explanation of A. (C) A is true but R is false. (D) A is false but R is true.
subject: Science
